title: Congratulations to Yves and Sabine, this makes three!
content: So, you do other things besides Rock & Typophile :P. Congratulations Yves!
author: adriano

comments.content: Wow, congrats Yves!

Another font baby - yay!   
Many warm congrats, and many warm waffles too.   
   
hhp

Congratulations, Yves. I am sure she is every bit as precious as our own new arrival.   
   
Cheers,   
   
T

We LOVE those babies! Congrats! and get some sleep :-)   
   
Chris

Congratulations! And Chris is right. This will be the last time you sleep for awhile.   
   
Jon
Congratulations, Yves!

Nice news.. Congratulations, Yves..   
_( Maybe we should add a typographic babies birthday calender to the Typophile iCal.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818130009im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)_
Finally! ;D Congratulations from the whole family :-D

Congratulations Yves!   
   
We�ll be missing you here at Typophile ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818130009im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/bigsmile.gif)

Enhorabuena Yves!   
   
Three... you are valiant Troubleman ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818130009im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

congrats yves.   
nice name, where does it come from?
Congratulations, Yves! Don't stay away for too long, take Thomas' advice and type with the baby--they'll learn to love it!
Congratulations, Yves and Sabine!
i wondered why the identification board seemed to been a bit neglected. now i know why! Congrats Yves!

Congratulations, Yves!!   
   
Now you'll have a real reason to stay up at night, not that font ID bull\*
Congratulations, Yves! The next wave of Typophiles is really getting started...

I never see the connection between the booth Troubleman I know. Great! And better with this new daughter name, beautiful one. Nona sound well. And with such good references, she will get some stories to tell to friends.   
   
F�licitations tardives mais sinc�res. Bravo aux parents :-)   
   
(we should start a topic on children names who sometime related to typefaces name)

\> 5 minutes old   
   
Very cute - and healthy-looking! Knock on wood.   
   
So she doesn't get screaming from you?   
   
hhp

Oh God, the belgians are proliferating! They could take over at any time now!   
   
Congratulations mate ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818130009im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) She's very cute and will definitely bring you lots of joy... and soiled diapers... but more of the former!
What a beauty! I think it willonly take her minutes to have her father wrapped around her little finger :-)

Well done!   
   
\> _I think it will only take her minutes to have_   
\> _her father wrapped around her little finger..._   
   
Daddy? May I have a Vandercook press, please? All the other kids at school have one... Pretty please?   
   
 ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818130009im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

\>Daddy? May I have a Vandercook press, please? All the other kids at school have one... Pretty please? \<   
   
That's enough to send him packing :-)
(Slightly belated) Congratulations Yves! The world needs more Belgians ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818130009im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
I'm really late, but Congrats Yves! What a beautiful baby!
I'm really really late, but your passion and love shine through in your posts and, even though I'm new here, I hope you don't mind that I want to say congratulations to you and your family.
[edit to above post: "passion about & love for your daughter"]
